andi mochtar wrote:

>   Is there any one knows how to test HTML in JUnit? Which part of JUnit 
> that can I use for HTML testing.

Strangely enough, you can try HtmlUnit!

Do you just want to test HTML or do you want to test your entire 
application using form submissions? Read _JUnit Recipes_, Chapters 12 
and 13.
